scripts.build-authorizer: cd authorizer && rm -rf dist && rm -f tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build-retriever: cd retriever && rm -rf dist && rm -f tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build-processor: cd processor && rm -rf dist && rm -f tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.test-only: npm run test-authorizer && npm run test-retriever && npm run test-processor
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test-only
scripts.build: npm run build-authorizer && npm run build-processor && npm run build-retriever
scripts.deploy: npm run build && sam deploy --stack-name TelemetryProcessorStack --s3-bucket <your-s3-bucket>
